text:
@realDonaldTrump Shut up you imbecile! We'll take our chances! I'm betting this radical left you cry about won't be killing us! They'll probably just give us healthcare, lead Covid-19 with true science and NOT alien dna, demon seed, taking disinfectants or ass lights!

You're pathetic! https://t.co/lVAAVbsX69
